page.title: 07SCOUTS AND GUIDES
page.content: If you live in {RUDDINGTON}and your children are bored then they can join these organisations. {1st.Brownies--Monday--Methodist Hall {2nd.Brownies--Tuesday-St.Peter's Rooms {3rd.Brownies-Thursday-St.Peter's Rooms {A pack Cubs--Tuesday--Methodist Hall {B pack Cubs--Wednesday--Village Hall {1st.Guides---Tuesday--Methodist Hall {2nd.Guides---Friday---The Hermitage {1st.Scouts---Monday---Methodist Hall { }The Scout Hut is being rebuilt in 1985 after a fire which also destroted the camping equipment and band instruments.The village has helped raise money to rebuild the hut. I am Andrew Dodson and once we went to Bunny Woods and because I was the only one who had remembered my boots I had to look for the rope swing in the mud to get every-one over the brook. { }
